posts.author: Kris Goodman
posts.post_text: October 11, 2014 at 12:43 AM#3Are you not better doing....assign sequence x cue x /cmd="macro x"That way if you change the exec that you place the sequence you won't have to update the macro that issues the command every time you move the sequence to another exec.-----------------------------Kris Goodman (The Flying Lampie)Lighting Director/ProgrammerMobile: +44 (0)7784 029 892Email:kris@theflyinglampie.comWeb:http://www.theflyinglampie.com
